          <title>
            <string language="en">The electronic structure of an element</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die elektronische Struktur eines Elements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La structure électronique d'un élément</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A estrutura eletrônica de um elemento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La struttura elettronica di un elemento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ηλεκτρονική δομή ενός στοιχείου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura electrónica de un elemento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams show the arrangement of electrons in the energy levels of an element.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrons</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme zeigen die Anordnung für 
Elektronen in den Energiestufen eines Elements.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes montrent l'agencement des 
électrons dans les forces d'un élément.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas mostram o arranjo dos elétrons 
nos níveis de energia de um elemento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi mostrano la disposizione degli 
elettroni nei livelli di energia di un elemento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα εμφανίζουν τη ρύθμιση των 
ηλεκτρονίων στα ενεργειακά επίπεδα ενός στοιχείου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas muestran el arreglo de electrones
en los niveles de energía de un elemento.</string>
          </description>
